```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
```

# Primary residency

```{r}
house_value <- 329900
repayment(house_value * (1-0.36),               
          5.9/100 / 12,     
          30 * 12) 
```


```{r}
monthly_cost(house_value = house_value,
             house_assessed_value = 191380,
             mil_rate = 2.469/100,
             monthly_hoa_fee = 374, 
             monthly_home_insurance = 115, 
             monthly_utility_fee = 0, 
             closing_fee = house_value * 0.07,
             one_time_fee = 0,
             year = 5, 
             saving_rate = 0.04, 
             down_payment = 0.36,
             mortgage_rate = 5/100,
             morrgage_year = 15)
```

# Primary residency -> Sell in 5 years
```{r}
monthly_cost(house_value = house_value,
             house_assessed_value = 191380,
             mil_rate = 2.469/100,
             monthly_hoa_fee = 374, 
             monthly_home_insurance = 115, 
             monthly_utility_fee = 0, 
             closing_fee = house_value * (0.07 + 0.12),   # two closing fee when buy and sell
             one_time_fee = 0,
             year = 5, 
             saving_rate = 0.04, 
             down_payment = 0.36,
             mortgage_rate = 5/100,
             morrgage_year = 15,
             annual_increase_rate = 3/100)

```
